attributes.action: Abolish the Cabinet system in Local Authorities and restore local democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the Cabinet system was introduced into local authorities a majority of democractically elected local councillors have been defrancised from being involved in making decisions affecting their local council and local areas.Councils must be returned back to the people by reverting back to the former system where councils had policy committees fully representing local democracy.
